price: Ntibinashobora kubatabara kandi na byo ubwabyo ntibyakwitabara.
arabic: وَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ لَهُمۡ نَصۡرٗا وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَنصُرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walā yastaṭīʿūna lahum naṣran walā anfusahum yanṣurūna
